pages.text: 36|55|Be tardid, ahli ʙihist imruz ʙo sodmoni sargarm [-i ne'mathoi ilohi] hastand
36|56|Onon va hamsaronason dar sojaho [-i gusturdai ʙihisti] ʙar taxtho takja zadaand
36|57|Dar on co [har guna] meva va har ci ʙixohand, ʙarojason [faroham] hast
36|58|[Bartar az in ne'matho] salomest, ki suxani Parvardigori mehruʙon ast
36|59|[On goh ʙa musrikon xitoʙ mesavad] «Ej gunahkoron, imruz [az mu'minon] cudo saved
36|60|Ej farzandoni Odam, ojo ʙo sumo pajmon naʙastam [va farmon nadodam], ki sajtonro naparasted, [ki] qat'an u dusmani oskori sumost
36|61|Va in ki [tanho] Maro ʙiparasted, [ki] rohi rost hamin ast
36|62|Va ʙe tardid, sajton ʙisjore az sumoro gumroh soxt. Ojo andesa namekarded
36|63|In [hamon] duzaxest, ki ʙa sumo va'da doda mesud
36|64|Imruz ʙa sazoi on ki kufr mevarzided, ʙa on [otas] vorid saved»
36|65|Imruz ʙar dahonhojason muhr menihem va dasthojason ʙo Mo suxan megujand va pojhojason ʙa on ci mekardand, guvohi medihand
36|66|Va agar ʙixohem, ʙe tardid, casmonasonro mahv mekunem, pas, [ʙo casmi ʙasta] ʙa suji [puli] sirot [az jakdigar] pesi megirand [to ʙa ʙihist roh joʙand]; ammo magar kucoro meʙinand
36|67|Va agar ʙixohem [zohirasonro taƣjir medihem va cunon] ononro dar coi xud masx [va zamingir] mekunem, ki natavonand gome ʙa pes ʙiguzorand jo ʙa aqiʙ ʙozgardand
36|68|Va Mo ʙa har ki umri tuloni ʙidihem, dar ofarinis digargunas mekunem [va uro ʙa notavonii zehni va ʙadani davroni kudaki ʙarmegardonem]. Pas, ojo [dar ʙorai qudrati Parvardigor] nameandesand
36|69|Va Mo ʙa u [Muhammad] se'r naomuxtaem va [soiri] soistai u nest. In [ki omuxtaem, cize] nest, magar andarz va Qur'one ravsan
36|70|To har kiro zinda [-dil] ʙosad, ʙim dihad va azoʙ ʙar kofiron muhaqqaq gardad
